title: Ranked placements
body: Hey Riot, I finished my ranked flex promos yesterday and was placed into bronze 2 (same as last season), then today i played another ranked game wanting to climb of course and then after the game i got another message saying i was just placed into bronze 3 kinda confused haha.

replies.body:
There is an update here:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XMZm8OPI-ranked-corrections-to-placement-results-and-ranks

Basically the matchmaking and seeding was so dodgy for flex they reset it, putting people much closer to where they should have been with regards to their ending rank for season 6 (which would be a little lower than season 6 ending rank).
